member.name: P:FolderSync.Params.CredFile
member.summary: Filename, if specified the user and password is read from the file (should be single line of text in the user:key format)

member.name: P:FolderSync.Params.IgnoreCertErrors
member.summary: If true, any bad server certificates are accepted.. NOT RECOMMENDED!

member.name: P:FolderSync.Params.NoSwitch
member.summary: If true, the files will be synched to a folder that is not used immediately, must switch folders manually on the server.
